title: Gangplank Builds
body:
Would like some feedback on this Gangplank build. 
Lucidity boots
Trinity Force
Infinity Edge
Stattik Shiv
Bloodthirster 
And I need one other item please recommend!!!!!

replies.body:
By build is:
Tri-force
IE
Dead man's plate
spirit visage 
stattik shiv
and then a purely situational item, if i am doing really well ill get bloodthirster, if not maybe a randuins, or if really necessary the CDR boots

but with Tri-force, shiv, passive and dead mans plate, boots arent the most necessary.
